name: Diderik van Wingerden
cooked:
Do you know of any SME that has successfully adopted the principles of Open Source Hardware and made a successful business (line) or product out of that, also in terms of financials?

We are developing an Open Source Manufacturing course at the Danish Design Center mainly aimed at SMEs and would like to have ‘social proof’ of a successful case.
raw:
Do you know of any SME that has successfully adopted the principles of Open Source Hardware and made a successful business (line) or product out of that, also in terms of financials?

We are developing an Open Source Manufacturing course at the Danish Design Center mainly aimed at SMEs and would like to have 'social proof' of a successful case.
